item.title: Research

item.title: Teaching
item.description: PhD Macroeconomics The material below is part of the macro sequence for PhD students at NHH. Feel free to email me for the Jupyter Notebooks solving the problem sets. Lecture 1: Dynamic programming [slides] [pset] Lecture 2: The savings problem [slides] [pset] Lecture 3: The lifecycle model [slides] [pset] Lecture 4: Search and matching [slides] [pset] Python workout (Lecture 0) [pset]
